title: Samsung Twin Cooling Plus Refrigerator - Friendly Foods
description:
The New Samsung Twin Cooling Plus cools the fridge and freezer compartments separately, preventing air from circulating from one into the other, thanks to Independent Cooling Systems. As a result, it maintains moisture-full freshness throughout the fridge, keeping ingredients fresh for longer. With two separate compartments, there’s no mixing of odor. And you can customize to your needs with 5 convertible modes: Regular, Energy Saving, Vacation, Fridge Max, Mini Fridge. Top-bottom or side-to-side, there are more designs, so you can pick any style you want. Even Triple Cooling models. How many coolers does yours have? Fresh food gets fresher!

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Samsung Refrigerators with Twin Cooling Plus. Shop for Samsung Refrigerators, as well as the full line of Samsung Appliances and Electronics at Abt today!
